Baseline Coverage Tobacco Ban.description: The baseline coverage for the intervention

Target Coverage Tobacco Ban.description: The target coverage for the intervention

Scale-Up Start Year Tobacco Ban.description: The index when scale-up starts for this intervention, where 0 == the first year of the time horizon

Scale-Up Final Year Tobacco Ban.description: The index when scale-up ends for this intervention, where 0 == the first year of the time horizon
